snippet: There is more than one way to win at the Tony Awards on Sunday. For producers, it’s about enticing ticket-buyers with a compelling musical number.
abstract: Choice of which Broadway musical songs will be performed in Tony Awards broadcast is result of negotiations between awards team, show producers and CBS network, who have overlapping but somewhat different priorities; musical numbers are seen as best way of drawing audiences to shows.
lead_paragraph: There is more than one way to win at the Tony Awards on Sunday. For producers, it’s about enticing ticket-buyers with a compelling musical number.

headline.main: The Tony Awards Broadcast: Broadway’s Chance to Woo America
headline.print_headline: Landing a Song, the Right Song, on the Tonys Broadcast
